title: Guilty Verdicts Claim 3 More Reporters, As Egyptian Courts Roll On
teaser: An Egyptian court issued its verdict in the trial of three journalists from the Al Jazeera English network. Though evidence of their alleged crimes was never presented in court, two of the journalists were slapped with seven-year sentences and one with a ten-year sentence. The decision has been met with international condemnation.
